Data Privacy Handbook Utrecht University 2021-01-25 Preface Disclaimer: This is work in progress! The Data Privacy Handbook is being developed as a readable and practical resource for researchers and research support staff to address data privacy-related issues that come up during the research cycle.
2 The GDPR & Research Data This chapter may include sections on the legal basis for processing research data, reusing privacy-sensitive data (further processing), and data subjects rights.
2.3 Data Subjects Rights 2.3.1 Right to be Informed 2.3.2 Right to Access
Techniques for Privacy Compliance This can include anonmyization, pseudonymization, encryption, federated analyses.
